Menu

Predict.Prevent.Prepare.

Through the latest available technologies, we inform you about your genetic and other pregnancy-related risks, empowering you along your family-forming journey.

Patient-Initiated Testing

expanded carrier screening (ECS)

Learn more

non-invasive prenatal test (NIPT)

Learn more

From the Comfort of Your Home

Mitera helps democratize access to genetic and other reproductive medical data in an efficient and medically-responsible manner.

  • We educate you on available tests
  • We place your test order and send you an at-home kit for sample collection
  • We provide you with genetic counseling on your results
  • We send your results to your existing doctor and make referrals for any other follow-up care

Our clinical experts in maternal-fetal medicine (MFM) and reproductive genetics provide clinical oversight and manage a VIRTUAL, end-to-end care process, which includes patient education, test orders and telehealth consults, to efficiently and responsibly deliver reproductive tests to you.

Telefetal Sonography 1

We partner with hospitals and other women’s health facilities to improve obstetrical outcomes, reduce upfront costs and achieve a better patient experience by providing MFM expertise through remote advanced ultrasound interpretations.

Book A Consultation
MFM Telehealth Consults

Whether you are currently pregnant or planning pregnancy, consultation with an MFM subspecialist in addition to your standard care can optimize your pregnancy outcome and reduce risk for you and your baby. MFM subspecialists are the experts in the maternal and fetal complications of pregnancy.

MFM Gestational Carrier Clearances

Whether you are currently pregnant or planning pregnancy, consultation with an MFM subspecialist in addition to your standard care can optimize your pregnancy outcome and reduce risk for you and your baby. MFM subspecialists are the experts in the maternal and fetal complications of pregnancy.

About Mitera
Mitera gives you virtual access to maternal-fetal medicine (MFM) subspecialists, reproductive genetic counselors and other pregnancy experts and helps inform you about your genetic and other pregnancy-related risks through the latest available technologies, empowering you along your family-forming journey.
